name: LOGISTIC_REGRESSION
desc: Binary Logistic Regression without regularization using Newton-Raphson method

parameters.name: x
parameters.desc: A list of variables from database. The variable should be Real, Integer. It cannot be empty
parameters.value: leftaccumbensarea, leftacgganteriorcingulategyrus, leftainsanteriorinsula, rightaccumbensarea, rightacgganteriorcingulategyrus, rightainsanteriorinsula

parameters.name: y
parameters.desc: A single variable from database. The variable should be Categorical with only two categories (i.e. Boolean). It cannot be empty.

parameters.name: pathology
parameters.desc: The name of the pathology that the dataset belongs to.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed. It cannot be empty

parameters.name: max_iter
parameters.desc: Maximum number of iterations. Must be a positive integer.
